reviewText: The title is misleading. "Sales Training" correct part and "building your sales career" have nothing to do with the actual course just clickbait. Course don't talk about how better way to build your sales career or anything on that part. Straight jumps to seling ideology and buyers' personas. It's a short version of sales techniques ... I would rate this course 0 stars if I could. If you want to know about sales techniques look for other courses because its minimal info in this course, more less introduction.
Content of course is quite okay but graded assignment has not been marked for the past one month. Slow process and kept pending
V​ery confusing course. I followed what I should and now I seem to lack to do something, according to the overview.W​aste of time and money.
these guys are best
The course is very informative! I was hoping for a practice/demo for application what we learned but overall it is very helpful!

Very informative course if you want to build your sales career. The presentation of this course was on point . The tutors took the time to break down each point. The quizzes were just right. Recommend you taking this course.
I love this course. It's very informative and I feel like I've gained a lot from it. It was worth the time.
it is very useful especially on week 2  but UN fortunately week one was not useful for me it takes

It is quite exciting to see how practicing a systematic sales approach can enrich the expertise of a sales individual and bring a fulfilling outcome and experience to one's selling career. This course has broadened my knowledge to understanding the importance of not just wanting to close a sales lead but to regard each sales opportunity as one that brings our customers closer to better realizing their challenges and what the sale value can do to overcoming such challenges and meeting their goals. This understanding has added immensely to my sales experience and also positions me on a more confident footing to align the knowledge acquired better in my sales career and influence my team very positively going forward.
Good
Very helpful.
I have learned so much valuable skills in this course. It will help me to get my sales job.Thank you for the effort.

If you are confused about whether to talk this course or not then let me tell you that It is a Great course to start your career in Sales !! Very well explained sessions ! I am feeling much confident now as it is a general belief that girls can not make better sales, so now I am pretty confident that if you know the technique well and thoroughly and have those right skills then, anyone can make great sales! Thank you so much to my mentors, HubSpot Academy and Coursera for bringing such amazing and helpful course! Looking forward to learn more!
